review: Love my Fire Stick.  Selection is great and the portability is fantastic!  A super product!
author: Dawn L. Collins

review: I love this little thing!!! Takes up hardly no space at all and works great. You won't regret buying this
author: Amanda Dillon

review: The fire stick is great!! So convenient and easy to get around. Really worth the price.
author: Briana Balsam

review: Easy to use and works beautifully so far.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love it but I would love it more if it supported YouTube as well
author: Bruno Raimondo

review: Probably my internet connection but stops to load a lot.
author: Allison Krulwich

review: I initially bought this because I wanted a low-risk way to dip my toe in the waters of living without cable. I don't think I will need to try and upgrade to any other device. This exceeded expectations. Very happy with it.
author: Joseph W.
